Name: Better & Better
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
15 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Initially strong and punchy, but as the name suggests, as the ice melts dilution makes this drink better and better.
History: Created circa 2007 by Jan Warren at 10 Downing in Manhattan, New York City but not popularised until 2012 when he was behind the stick at Dutch Kills, Long Island City. Jan's original recipe calls for Fidencio blanco mezcal.
